General.Name: Jayant Agro Organics Limited
General.Description: Jayant Agro-Organics Limited, an oleochemical company, engages in the manufacture and distribution of in castor oils and its derivatives worldwide. The company operates through three segments: Castor Oil, Derivatives, and Power Generation. It offers dehydrated, hydrogenated, ethoxylated, and cold pressed castor oil; and hydrogenated castor oil fatty acid, 2-octanol PAC, Jagroflow-13, Jagroflow-15, sebacic acid, dehydrated castor oil fatty acid, and 2-octanone, as well as pharma grade castor oil. The company's products are used in agriculture, cosmetics, electronics, lubricants, paint, perfumeries, pharma, polymers and plastics, rubber, and textiles industries. It also engages in the power generation business. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Mumbai, India. Jayant Agro-Organics Limited is a subsidiary of Jayant Finvest Limited.
